name: Hop To The Beat
description:
Hop To The Beat

Hop to the Beat is a simple 3D Rhythm Game inspired by the retro game Frogger released in 1981. You will play as a laid-back chicken who loves to jump to the smooth and relaxing sounds of lo-fi music. To keep the beat and stay on rhythm, you must cross a forest and avoid hazards that stand in your way, all while keeping up with the mellow rhythm of lo-fi music. Your Score will increase when you jump according to the beat of the music.

This game was made for Joints Game Jam.

Controls

W  = Move Up

A = Move Left

D = Move Right 

Play Now!
